title: Blood Moon Yasuo.....but his pants......
body:
I am very happy he his getting a new skin, but can we please get his pants fixed. Yasuo without baggy pants is like Ahri without fluffy tails.


http://www.newsoflegends.com/wp-content/uploads/2016/02/Blood-Moon-Yasuo-1024x640.jpg

https://pbs.twimg.com/media/CazD99aWAAE2bTM.jpg

http://www.newsoflegends.com/wp-content/uploads/2016/02/Yasuo_Splash_3-1024x604.jpg

replies.body: No blood moon skin for the one that worships the moon... Makes a whole lot of sense rito...
He's wearing armor and it would collide with the red rope

Add a quick new flute song, demonic sword (http://orig01.deviantart.net/0... and a deep tone, doubled over voice mod and I guarantee you this skin will sell for 1350+

it's so good but just the littlest things are missing (X.x') to make me want this over the Project: Yasuo (Who still needs a Project border)

Spread the word please <3$$$

Live long and YasuOwn
Baggy pants covered with armor would be very uncomfortable in fights.
